title: Relax in paradise with The Thalgo Spa’s new ’5,7,10’ Spa Packages
text:
Relax in paradise with The Thalgo Spa’s new ’5,7,10’ Spa Packages Relax in paradise with The Thalgo Spa’s new ’5,7,10’ Spa Packages Details Category: Hotel   15:30 The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi has launched an immersive new range of Thalgo Spa Packages available to enjoy over 5,7 or 10 days of your stay. The focus is a range of exclusive packages, tailor made to ensure results and an ideal spa experience. Try a multi-treatment spa break and be spoilt with a selection of incredible daily rituals throughout your time at the property. Sample Maldivian rejuvenation and relax into an ocean of sensory delights. 
Ranging from Relaxation to Slim and Sculpt, from Mukthi Ayurvedic treatments focusing on Ayurveda and Yoga to Traditional Chinese therapies, each selection of treatments has been carefully constructed. The launch of the Thalgo Spa earlier in the year infused the spa with the ancient healing principles of the East and West, in combination with 50 years of skincare knowledge from Thalgo, a pioneer in marine scientific research. The NEW range of Thalgo Spa Packages at The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi are the ultimate journey of relaxation and balance. Unwind Spa Packages Be swept away with a series of soothing and calming rituals, available over a 5,7 or 10 day period. Highlights from The Unwind Spa Packages include a Jet Lag Relieving Ritual (75mins) on arrival. Ideal to refresh body and mind, this invigorating and revitalising massage gets the bloody circulating and is the perfect defence to feelings of tiredness or lethargy. Relaxing hot stones and full body massage leaves tired muscles boosted and re-energised. Take your pick between the Marine Prelude by Thalgo or Fruit Blast Treatment (60 mins). Experience double the luxury with a full body exfoliation and indulgent wrap. The ultimate combination provides skin with rich, healing moisture. The exfoliation smoothes skin and prepares it for the incredibly moisturising second step. Wrap treatments include Marine Prelude which offers the Thalgo signature marine based ingredients with sea salts and marine mud from the Dead Sea. Fruity Blast incorporates fresh fruits and vegetables for a maximum vitamin boost. A soothing scalp massage ensures relaxation and peacefulness whilst the wrap envelopes the body with goodness. The Bondithaan Kurun (60mins) reflects the Maldivian traditional therapies also available at the Thalgo Spa. This Madivian Herbal Bundle massage focuses on easing muscular stiffness and stress related symptoms. Drawing on the Ancient Divehi medical practices, a full body massage is complimented with a selection of locally sourced herbs , chosen for their unique medicinal values. Made into a bundle with local coconut oil these are applied onto the back, soothing and restoring tired muscles. The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi offers the Unwind Spa Packages for 5,7 or 10 days. Prices start from $955/£617and includes all treatments. Spa packages available to guests of The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi. Slim & Sculpt Packages A combination of Thalgo’s Integrative Slimming Expertise and expert yoga instruction comes together to form the ultimate way to slim and sculpt whilst still enjoying the peace and relaxation of the Thalgo Spa. Work on your body with a 5,7 or 10 day programme. Featuring the High Precision Shaping Treatment (90 mins) as an integral part of the programme, this corrective anti-cellulite, anti-excess-fat and anti-slackening treatment combines three exclusive techniques. An Active Oxygen body wrap corrects fibrosis cellulite and fat storage with a massive ‘injection’ of pure oxygen. Followed by a series of intensive sculpting massages, the treatment is completed with an application of High Performance Firming Cream or Intensive Correcting cream to ensure long lasting effects. Circulation is key to cellulite reduction and the combination of stimulating circulation and the The Frigi Anti-Cellulite Cold Wrap (60mins) eliminates excess fluid build up from the abdomen, hip and thigh area. The Slim & Sculpt packages also include a combination of relaxing yoga and soothing steam baths. Find balance on this paradisial island and leave feeling better than ever in body and mind. The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi offers the Slim & Sculpt Packages for 5,7 or 10 days. Prices start from $1497/£964 and includes all treatments. Spa packages available to guests of The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi. Traditional Treatments Packages Mukthi Ayurvedic Packages A personal consultation with the Ayurvedic creates tailored treatments designed to align and balance the body. Based on the Ayurvedic system, the doctor will prescribe the combination of therapies and offer key lifestyle advice to improve, health and happiness. Yoga and inner stillness are the focus of these packages and the combination of steam baths and detoxifying treatments offer the ideal complement. Treatments include the Shirodhara treatment (60 mins) which features a continuous warm oil stream over the third eye. The soothing droplets create a balancing effect, releasing mental stress and tensions. Let a blissful state of consciousness unfold. The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi offers the Mukthi Ayurvedic Packages for 5,7 or 10 days. Prices start from $1035/£665 and includes all treatments. Spa packages available to guests of The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi. Revitalization Chinese Medicine Packages Be enveloped in the world of Chinese medicine which spans an array of practices from acupuncture to cupping to herbalism. With more than 500 years of history behind it, The Chinese Medicine Consultant will evaluate and prescribe a series of highly restorative treatments. A selection of the Chinese therapies on offer includes Cupping and Tu Na Massage. All of these therapies work on improving health and vitality, utilising ancient traditions to stimulate Qi energy and bring energy and vigour back to tired body and mind. The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi offers the Chinese Medicine Packages for 5,7 or 10 days. Prices start from $816/£524 and includes all treatments. Spa packages available to guests of The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi.
